validateStudentsDto.EMPTY_ARRAY: There must be at least one student to validate.

createStudentDto.TOO_SHORT_NAME: Student's name must have at least 3 characters.
createStudentDto.STRING_NAME: Only characters are accepted in the student's name.
createStudentDto.TOO_SHORT_LASTNAME: Student's last name must have at least 3 characters.
createStudentDto.STRING_LASTNAME: Only characters are accepted in the student's last name.
createStudentDto.INVALID_EMAIL: Student's email should be a valid email.
createStudentDto.NOT_STRING_NUMBER_PARALLEL: Only characters are accepted in the student's cycle.
createStudentDto.INVALID_LENGTH_NUMBER_PARALLEL: Student's cycle should have max two character.
createStudentDto.NOT_STRING_PARALLEL: Only characters are accepted in the student's parallel.
createStudentDto.INVALID_LENGTH_PARALLEL: Student's parallel should have only one character.
